ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] WOW, Huge improvements this patch...
ygData.msgSnippet: Lot s of good stuff including some things that have been broken since release.  Now if we could just get some response on the bard song issues.  I did notice
ygData.messageBody:
Lot's of good stuff including some things that have been broken since
release. Now if we could just get some response on the bard song issues. I
did notice that we are the only hybrid not to get a mana increase
apparently, wonder if that's true? If the hybrid mana mod is just a toggle,
bet there's a whole slew of DDD's massacres tonight ;-)

Kit

- Rangers, Paladins, and SKs now have mana equivalent to that of a pure
caster with the same stats. This will give those hybrids a good deal more
mana, regardless of their stats.

*Changes/Fixes*

- Small Studded Tunic recipe now works
- Scaler recipe now works
- Elven Wine can now be brewed
- Some pelt-dropping animals were always dropping ruined pelts, rather than
pelts of quality. This has been repaired.
